name: Springans Call!
effectText: Target 1 "Springans" monster or "Fallen of Albaz" in your GY; Special Summon it. During the Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card and 1 Fusion Monster from your GY, then target 1 "Springans" Xyz Monster you control; attach 1 Fusion Monster that lists "Fallen of Albaz" as material from your Extra Deck to that monster as material. You can only use each effect of "Springans Call!" once per turn.
